anya-e0401n0:5_1: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca.
anya-e0401n0:5_2: Tattha padhānattho paramatthonāma, padhānatthotica padavākyānaṁ mukhyattho ujukattho.
anya-e0401n0:5_3: Pariyāyatthopi koci, yuttarūpo attho paramattho yeva.
anya-e0401n0:6_9: Tatthajanānāma idhabodhaneyyasattā adhippetā, yesabbaññudesanaṁ sutvā catussacca dhammaṁ bujjhissanti.
anya-e0401n0:6_12: Tattha jātikkhettaṁ nāmadasasahassa cakkavāḷaṁ, yaṁ ekaṁ buddhakkhettanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:6_13: Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṁ buddhabhāvatthāya pathamamahābhinīhārakālādīsu ekappahārenapathavikampanādīnipavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:6_15: Jātikkhettemahāsareyassa ekassa saddhammaraṁsijālino mahāsūrassa udayā tasmiṁ jātikkhette mahāsare janambujāpabujjhiṁsūtiyojanā.
anya-e0401n0:7_1: Janambuja santānesupavattaṁ mahantaṁ mohatamaṁnūdati apaneti, saddhammaraṁsijālaṁ vissajjanto antaradhāpetīti mahāmohatamonudo.
anya-e0401n0:8_0: Evaṁ buddhassapaṇāmaṁ katvā attanā icchitaṁ paṇāmappayojanaṁ pariṇāmento ‘‘sañjāta’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:8_2: Tattha ‘‘sañjāta’’nti suṭṭhujātaṁ, anamataggesaṁsāre daḷhaṁ pavattanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:9_0: Evaṁ sappayojanaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sanidānaṁ ganthappaṭiññaṁ karonto ‘‘porāṇakehī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:10_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṁ yācanaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:10_3: Tattha ādigāthāyaṁ ‘‘abhidhammatthasaṅgahe porāṇakehi viññūhi vaṇṇitā bahūvaṇṇanā idhalokamhidissantī’’ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:11_5: Yasmā paramatthassadīpanaṁ yācanti, tasmā imissāṭīkāya ‘‘paramatthadīpanī’’ti nāmaṁpi siddhaṁhoti.
anya-e0401n0:11_16: Yato so sāgaroti vuccati, sānaṁdhanaratanānaṁ gehagabbhasadisattāsāgaroti hissa attho.
anya-e0401n0:12_17: Mandabuddhino sotujane pabodheti vikāseti, ñāṇa vikāsaṁpāpetīti mandabuddhippabodhanā.
anya-e0401n0:12_25: So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṁ pariniṭṭhānaṁ ñāpetuṁ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante yojito.
anya-e0401n0:14_1: Evaṁ ganthārabbhavidhānaṁ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṁ dassento ‘‘abhidhammatthasaṅgaha’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:14_16: Tattha gacchatīti gato, purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma.
anya-e0401n0:14_17: Purisoti padenadassito padhānattho adhippetattho abhidheyyattho nāmāti.
anya-e0401n0:16_0: Cittaṁ cetasikaṁ rūpaṁ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n0:17_1: Evaṁ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti ca, - padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:18_0: Kecipanavadeyyuṁ, teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ pattā visuṁ saṅgahatthānāmabhaveyyuṁ, naabhidhammatthā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:18_1: Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṁ abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:18_2: Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti, na visuṁ saṅgahatthānāma.
anya-e0401n0:18_3: Tattha vuttābhidhammatthātihi vuttaṁ, natuvuttaṁ tattha vuttāsaṅgahatthāti.
anya-e0401n0:18_5: Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:18_20: Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṁ cūḷaṭīkaṁ upādāya mahāṭīkāti pākaṭā.
anya-e0401n0:19_0: Ganthappakāroca pakāravantehi dhammehi sahevasijjhati, vinā nasijjhatīti adhippāyena ‘‘soabhidhammatthapadenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:19_2: Abhidhammatthapadaṁ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṁna vadatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘taṁ nasundara’’nti.
anya-e0401n0:19_4: Tattha, atthānugataṁ nāmaṁ anvatthanāmaṁ, yathā sukhitassajanassa sukhotināmaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:19_5: Attharahitaṁ āropitaṁ nāmaṁ ruḷināmaṁ, yathā dukkhitassajanassa sukhoti nāmaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:19_11: Saṅgahaganthonāma pāḷiyaṁtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n0:19_35: Phalānubhavanatthāya tatthatattha phalānubhavanakiccesu payujjīyatīti payojananti pivadanti.
anya-e0401n0:19_40: Yathātaṁ asukasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti vutte taṁ raṭṭhaṁsu bhikkhanti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:19_41: Asukaraṭṭhaṁ subhikkhantivutte tasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0401n0:19_42: Payojanaṁ pana abhidhammattha saddena dassetabbaṁ natthi, saṅgahavacanasāmatthiyeneva siddhaṁ hotīti adhippāyena ‘‘saṅgahasaddenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:19_43: Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṁ icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:19_44: Itarathā aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘taṁ na sundara’’nti vatvā ‘‘nahī’’tiādinā hetuvākyena tadatthaṁ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:20_1: Evaṁ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṁpañcannaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ pañcappayojanāni dassento ‘‘tatthā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:20_7: Evaṁ kiccapaccayānaṁ katthaci sakkattha dīpanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:20_8: Sakavacanaṁ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṁ ‘‘yathāhā’’ti pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṁ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:20_10: Anantare vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ kathaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āha, kathaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ āha, kathaṁ ṭīkāyaṁ āhāti evaṁ yathārahaṁ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:20_15: Natthi kutoci hetuto bhayaṁ yesaṁ te akuto bhayā.
anya-e0401n0:20_21: Tehi porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu tattha tattha vippakiṇṇepakiṇṇakavinicchayeyuttaṭṭhānesu saṅgahetvā abhinava aṭṭhakathāyo karonti.
anya-e0401n0:20_26: Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva icchantīti kathaṁ viññāyatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:20_27: Tesaṁ vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṁ saṅgahakāra gāthaṁ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:21_11: Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṁ ‘‘anuttaresū’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:21_23: Aññaṁ puññaṁ atikkamanto sayati pavattatīti atissayo.
anya-e0401n0:21_27: Kathañca anubalaṁ deti, kathañca okāsalābhaṁ karotīti āha ‘‘sayaṁ payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_28: Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṁ balavataraṁ upatthambhakakammaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_33: Cattāro paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo ca sukhuppatti paccayā.
anya-e0401n0:21_34: Tehi paccayehi pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṁ pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṁ pavattiyā ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti.
anya-e0401n0:21_35: Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti.
anya-e0401n0:21_36: Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo nāma pathavi ādayo vātapittasemhādayoca.
anya-e0401n0:21_47: Aniṭṭhapphala santāna janakāni, akusala janaka kammāni, apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti, tesaṁ vipākassa anokāsakaraṇenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:21_50: Abhivādetabbānaṁ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ abhivādanakammegaruṁkaraṇaṁ abhivādana sīlaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:21_52: Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti attānaṁ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0401n0:21_57: Laddhaguṇoti ca taṁtaṁpasaṅga visodhanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:21_58: Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi ayamidha adhippeto.
anya-e0401n0:21_64: Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṁnāma diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṁ phalaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_65: Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_66: Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena ‘‘diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_67: Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā.
anya-e0401n0:21_77: Itarathā ‘kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti.
anya-e0401n0:21_79: Evaṁ vandanāyapayojanaṁ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ payojanaṁ dīpetuṁ ‘‘yasmāpanā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_80: Tattha, ‘‘āditoviditesatī’’tiādimhi-bhāsissaṁ abhidhammattha saṅgaha-nti padaṁ sutvā viññātesati, ‘‘ussāhojāyati’’.
anya-e0401n0:21_81: Imaṁ uggahetvā sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena jānissāma, tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa payojanassabhāgino bhavissāmāti cittuppāda sambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:23_4: Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṁ yaṁ vattabbaṁ avuttaṁ, tassa tassa kathanatthāya anuvākyassa ārambho.
anya-e0401n0:23_6: Kathaṁpanaaviparītatthe pavatto sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṁ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato ca anvayato ca puna vitthārento ‘‘tathāhī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:23_7: Tattha, ‘‘tathāhī’’ti tassa vacanassa ayaṁ vitthāroti joteti.
anya-e0401n0:23_9: ‘‘Attano visaye evā’’ti attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṁ visayocāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:23_10: Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena ananta bhedo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:23_11: Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṁpi sabbākārato jānituṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:23_13: Tattha ‘‘sabbākārato’’ti sabhāvato, hetuto, paccayato, phalato, nissandato, kālato, desatotiādinā ākārena.
anya-e0401n0:23_23: ‘‘Sabbaññumahābhavaṅga’’nti sabbesaṁsabbaññubuddhānaṁ pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṁ aṭṭhasu mahāvipākesu pathamamahāvipākaṁ bhavaṅga cittaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:23_25: ‘‘Niccakālaṁ upaṭṭhahantī’’ti sabbakālaṁ upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n0:23_31: Tasmā parittakaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṁ dhammānaṁ napahotīti codakassa adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:24_0: Evaṁ sammāsaddassa atthaṁ vicāretvā idāni saṁsaddassa atthaṁ vicārento ‘‘saṁsaddopanā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:24_13: ‘‘Chaḍḍitattā’’ti etāsamāpattiyonālaṁ bodhāya, atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya saṁvattantīti evaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā chaḍḍitattā.
anya-e0401n0:25_1: ‘‘Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū’’ti imasmiṁ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike ananussute sucatussacca dhammesu.
anya-e0401n0:25_4: Tappaccayā tadanantarā evasabbaññutaññāṇaṁ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇātī’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:25_5: ‘‘Tadanantarā’’ti ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṁ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:25_8: Tāsu hi paccattavacanaṁ, upayogavacanaṁ, karaṇa vacanaṁ, sampadāna vacanaṁ, nissakkavacanaṁ, sāmivacanaṁ, summavacananti evaṁ anukkamena sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n0:26_1: ‘‘Vasibhāva’’nti ettha attano vasaṁ vattetuṁ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma.
anya-e0401n0:26_6: Katthaci pana ‘‘vasī’’ti itthiliṅgapadaṁpi dissati=tatrimā pañcavasiyo āvajjanavasīsamāpajjanavasī=tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:28_3: ‘‘Itikiṁdutīyenā’’ti iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṁ payojanaṁ atthīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_7: ‘‘Thero ca tesaṁ aññataro’’, tasmā mattaṁ na karoti, dutīyaṁ atula padaṁ āharīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:28_9: ‘‘Nakevalaṁ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva icchi tabbaṁ hotī’’ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:28_14: Kathaṁ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘anussatiṭṭhānesū’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:28_17: ‘‘Tikkhāsūrāhutvāvahatī’’ti gambhīresu attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0401n0:28_19: Guṇanāmapadānaṁ guṇatthonāmaviggaha vākyesu pākaṭo, siddhapadesu apākaṭo.
anya-e0401n0:28_20: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṁ ajānantānaṁ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṁ ‘‘yathāvutta vacanatthayogepi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:28_23: Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_25: So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_29: Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṁ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti sutvā udānaṁ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ buddho=ti.
anya-e0401n0:28_30: Tasmā buddhoti nāmaṁpi loke mahantaṁ sudullabhaṁguṇapadaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:28_32: ‘‘Sabhāvaniruttiṁ ajānantānaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpī’’ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṁ atulapadaṁ, padasahassaṁpi vuccamānaṁ satthusamaññāmattameva sampajjati.
anya-e0401n0:28_33: Tādisāhi janā idaṁ loke mahantaṁ guṇapadantipi najānanti.
anya-e0401n0:29_0: ‘‘Atulo’’ti aññena so asadisoti vā, añño vātena sadisotassanatthītivā, - dvidhāpiattholabbhati.
anya-e0401n0:29_2: Kiñcāpi makkhali pūraṇādayo visuṁvisuṁ - ahaṁ sabbaññū sabbadassāvī - tica, ahaṁ sammāsambuddho-tica paṭijānantā yugaggāhino hutvā vicaranti.
anya-e0401n0:29_3: Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:29_6: ‘‘Yaṁ buddha bhūtassa atulattaṁ, etaṁ anacchariya’’nti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_7: Yadi cetaṁ anacchariyaṁ hoti, katamaṁ pana tāva acchariyaṁ bhavatīti āha ‘‘sampatijātassā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_12: = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṁ devānubhāva=ntihi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_13: Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā honti.
anya-e0401n0:29_18: Evaṁ acchambhi vācaṁ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_23: Idampi anacchariyaṁ, aññaṁ pitato acchariyataraṁ atthīti dassetuṁ ‘‘yadāpanā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_24: Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva thapetvā aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo .
anya-e0401n0:29_32: Tadeva ca sabbesaṁpi bodhisattānaṁ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘sāvakabodhisattāpī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_37: Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:29_38: Buddha suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:29_41: Pathaviyaṁ paṁsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_45: Ayaṁ bhāvoyeva tesaṁ bhūmīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:29_49: Tayoniyatā, bodhisattaniyato ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca.
anya-e0401n0:29_53: Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṁ ‘‘ekena pariyāyenā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:29_54: Vattabbamevanatthitesaṁ dvinnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ pārami pavicayaññāṇa sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:30_11: ‘‘Kammasādhanenevā’’ti pubbe-tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṁ idhavuttena kamma sādhana vacanattheneva.
anya-e0401n0:30_12: ‘‘Tadatthasiddhito’’ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṁ vuttassa duvidhassa atthassa siddhito.
anya-e0401n0:30_20: Vatticchaṁ anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:30_28: Itthiliṅgesati, tatopi eko akāroti katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita akāropi assutoyevanāmahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_1: Evaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ padattha saṁvaṇṇanaṁ katvā idāni tesaṁyeva atthuddhārasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ karonto ‘‘imehi panā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:31_5: Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṁsa koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṁ devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṁ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:31_9: Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṁ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṁ vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena ‘‘pahānasampadāyaṁ vā sā saṅgahitā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_11: Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁsīlaṁ, veramaṇisīlaṁ, cetasikaṁsīlaṁ, saṁvarosīlaṁ, avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṁ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:31_12: Pahānaṁ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṁ tadevañāṇadvayaṁ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_13: Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā aphalāti āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:31_14: Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṁ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n0:31_15: Tasmā yathātesaṁ kilesappahānaṁ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_29: Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṁ pāṇātipātādīnaṁ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_30: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṁ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_32: Tathāhi vuttaṁ paṭisambhidā magge=uppādo bhayaṁ , anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_37: Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṁ vipassanā ñāṇañca maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_41: ‘‘Sīlādiguṇehī’’ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi.
anya-e0401n0:31_43: ‘‘Lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitassā’’ti dvattiṁsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa.
anya-e0401n0:31_48: Aparipāka gatindriyānaṁ sattānaṁ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca ettha vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_52: ‘‘Sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhī’’ti ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṁ aggamaggaññāṇaṁ gahitaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:33_2: Yathā=sasaṅghaṁlokanāyakaṁ namassissaṁ=ti etthasahasaddassa samavāyatthattā ahaṁlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṁ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:33_3: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṁ kiriyāsamavāyattho sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṁ ‘‘dūratohaṁ…pe…
anya-e0401n0:33_6: Ettha ca‘‘samavāyo’’ti dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ bahūnaṁ vā atthānaṁ ekasmiṁ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṁ avecca ayanaṁpavattanaṁ samavāyo.
anya-e0401n0:33_7: Paccānutāpa paccānumodanādiṭhānesu=ahaṁ pubbedānaṁ nadadissaṁ, sīlaṁ narakkhissaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:33_8: - Anekajāti saṁsāraṁ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṁ payujjatīti āha ‘‘namassissa’’nti namassiṁti.
anya-e0401n0:33_11: Yathā, kāko setī bhavati, bako kaṇhībhavatīti.
anya-e0401n0:33_15: Buddhaṁ dhammañca saṅghañcavanditvā-tiādīsu visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti.
anya-e0401n0:33_17: ‘‘Abhivāditabhāvo’’ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṁ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle dhamma saṅghānaṁpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_18: ‘‘Abhivādetabba bhāvo’’ti vuttepana tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_19: Dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, sīlaṁ rakkhitabbantiādīsu viya dhammasaṅghānāmasabbakālaṁpi abhivādetabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:33_20: Evaṁ dhammasaṅghānaṁ sabbakālaṁpi abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tatthā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:33_23: ‘‘Attano nidassanenā’’ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā nīharitvā dassitena payogena.
anya-e0401n0:33_26: Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṁtīhidvāre hivandatīti gahetvā ‘‘abhivādiyā’’ti ettha abhivādiyādhīti ca atthaṁ nīharanti.
anya-e0401n0:33_27: Appadhāna kiriyāpade pana tadattha nīharaṇaṁ asambhāvento ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:33_28: Tattha ‘‘apicā’’ti kiñci vattabbaṁ atthīti atthajotane ayaṁ nipātasamudayo.
anya-e0401n0:34_1: Sadhano puriso, dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena atissayattha dīpakā honti.
anya-e0401n0:34_3: Tasmā idhāpi tathā rūpaṁ atissayatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘attanānimmitena…pe…
anya-e0401n0:34_11: Atha kho idaṁpi padaṁ satthu paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇa padamevahotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:35_5: ‘‘Nibbānañcanippariyāyato dhammo nāmā’’ti kasmā vuttaṁ, nanu nissaraṇappahānameva nibbānassa kiccaṁ, idañca samucchedappahānanti codanaṁ pariharanto ‘‘ariyamaggāhī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:35_6: ‘‘Nibbānena saheva hutvā’’ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṁ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṁ attano patiṭṭhaṁ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:35_7: Apica, samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato samānagatikaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:35_18: Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā kiccapaccayānaṁpi atthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:35_19: Yathā, diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ, mutaṁ, viññātanti vuttaṁ ‘‘dhāraṇāraho’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:35_28: Tatīya vikappe ‘‘apatamānaṁ vahantī’’ti apatamānaṁ katvā vahanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_32: Dhammadīpā bhikkhave bhavatha dhammappaṭisaraṇā, anaññappaṭisaraṇā tihi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:35_36: Dhammavicāraṇāyaṁ, codakopaṭipatti dhammaṁ dasavidha dhammato aññaṁmaññamāno ‘‘kasmā’’tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n0:35_37: So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti, tattheva antogadhoti dassento ‘‘sopanā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:35_38: ‘‘Maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā hotī’’ti yathā ambarukkho ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:35_39: Kasmā, itoyevatassa pupphapphalassa jātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā ca.
anya-e0401n0:35_41: Kasmā, itoyeva tassajātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā ca.
anya-e0401n0:35_43: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṁ viruḷiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_45: Evameva kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṁ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento vuḍḍhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti.
anya-e0401n0:35_46: ‘‘Pubbacetanāviyadāne’’ti yathā tividhaṁ puññaṁ, dānamayaṁ puññaṁ sīlamayaṁ puññaṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ puññanti vutte dānavatthu pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṁ ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā dānantveva saṅkhyaṁgatā.
anya-e0401n0:35_47: Evaṁ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito, ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṁ gatoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_4: ‘‘Puthujjanakalyāṇako’’ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako vinayakalyāṇako suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_5: Tattha vinaye paññattāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:36_6: So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāra gocara sampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:36_7: Tattha vinaye paññattākalyāṇappaṭipattiduvidhā, ādi brahmacariyakasīlaṁ abhisamacārikasīlanti.
anya-e0401n0:37_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta kalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:37_1: So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṁ duggatibhayaṁ samatikkanto hoti.
anya-e0401n0:37_3: Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_5: Dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_7: Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_9: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_10: Tattha buddhe aveccappasādo nāma arahaṁ, sammāsambuddho, tiādikānaṁ guṇapadānaṁ attha jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo.
anya-e0401n0:37_15: Sappurisasaṁsevo, saddhammassavanaṁ, yoniso manasikāro, dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni bahūni suttantāni idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0401n0:38_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:38_1: So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido ariyadhammesu vinīto.
anya-e0401n0:38_2: So rūpaṁ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:38_3: Tattha, ‘‘sutavā’’ti ettha khandhā, yatana, dhātu, paṭiccasamuppāda, satipaṭṭhānā, dīsu uggaha paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto.
anya-e0401n0:38_4: So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:40_0: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n0:41_1: Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_2: Idhekacco dhammaṁ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_4: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_7: Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṁ satta ariyapuggalā sikkhanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_10: Ti saraṇa saraṇaṁ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_11: Tattha, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannonāma sotāpatti maggaṭṭho ariyapuggalo.
anya-e0401n0:41_14: ‘‘Saṅghe asaṅgahito’’ti saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ca, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ca, evarūpesu ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n0:41_15: ‘‘Na hitaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṁ sampajjatī’’ti idaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha vacanetassapuggalassa asaṅgahita bhāvasādhanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_17: Sace pana sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ anuddhissatameva puggalaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gaccheyya āyasmantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_19: Atha sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṁ gaccheyya saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_21: Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_22: Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṁ nāma sakiṁ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṁ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṁpi na bhijjati.
anya-e0401n0:41_26: Sabbappathamaṁ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṁ nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_28: Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṁ gaṇhantassa gahaṭṭhassa saraṇa gamanaṁ sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:41_31: Tañca kho ubhinnaṁpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā sati evāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_40: Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n0:41_45: ‘‘Anekesu suttasahassesū’’ti vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni dissanti suttantesupi.
anya-e0401n0:42_1: Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘samitakilesāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:42_2: Santa saddo pana pasattheca, pūjiteca, sappuriseca, paṇḍiteca, dissatīti imaṁ abhidhānatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘pasatthāna’’ntiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:42_7: Ahitoyeva sampajjati, yebhuyyena duggati vipākattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:42_9: ‘‘Tathā dhārentassā’’ti ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati, sugati nibbāna sampāpakattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:43_1: Etena samānadiṭṭhisīlā janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo.
anya-e0401n0:43_2: Saṁhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_8: Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_9: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:43_12: ‘‘Gaṇoti saṅghoyeva vuccati’’ saṅghasaddassapi samūhaṭṭhe niruḷhattā, ‘‘so vinayakammesu pasiddho’’ti pañcasaṅghā catuvaggasaṅgho, pañcavaggasaṅgho, dasavaggasaṅgho, vīsativaggasaṅgho, atirekavīsativaggasaṅgho, catuvaggakaraṇīyaṁ kammaṁ, pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṁ kammantiādinā pasiddho pākaṭo.
anya-e0401n0:43_13: Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṁ vipākapphalappaṭi lābhatthāya dinnaṁ dānakammaṁ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0401n0:43_15: ‘‘Arahatī’’ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena icchita patthitassa āyatiṁ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena dāyakassa ca avirādhanato asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahati.
anya-e0401n0:43_18: Tesaṁ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṁ phalaṁ na sampādeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_23: Sayañca taṁdānaṁ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato vā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātanato vā duggati bhāgino honti.
anya-e0401n0:43_25: ‘‘Upasampadākammaṁ sammuti nāmā’’ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:43_27: Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n0:43_29: Tathā hi vuttaṁ vinaye bhikkhu vibhaṅge.
anya-e0401n0:43_31: Tattha, ‘‘ṭhānārahenā’’ti upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ pāpetuṁ arahenāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:43_35: Apica ‘‘sammuti saṅgho’’ti, devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṁ samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_36: ‘‘Ariyapuggalasamūho’’ti puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti, tena saha aṭṭhavidho ariya puggalasamūho.
anya-e0401n0:43_37: ‘‘Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā’’ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma visuṁ navattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:43_38: Tasmiñca navattabbe sati, sammuti saṅghotipi vattabba kiccaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:43_39: Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho tveva vattabbaṁ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:43_41: Idha pana saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:43_42: Tattha sammuti saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ vinayakammesūti vuttameva.
anya-e0401n0:43_46: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_48: ‘‘Tathā tathā saṁvaṇṇetvā’’ti āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo, dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalīkaraṇīyyo, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā, tiādināsuṭṭhu thometvā.
anya-e0401n0:43_50: ‘‘Puthujjana saṅgho’’ti idaṁ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṁ puthujjanasaṅghaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_51: Ettha ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n0:43_52: So sace puthujjano hoti, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:43_53: Yadi ariya puggalo hoti, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:44_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā.
anya-e0401n0:44_2: Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṁ patvā koci bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n0:45_0: Khettaṁ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n0:52_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṁ ‘‘sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:54_3: Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:54_13: Tathāhi vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvā.
anya-e0401n0:54_14: Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṁ na passati, acittattā.
anya-e0401n0:54_16: Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu kenacittena passati.
anya-e0401n0:54_17: Īdisī panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_18: Tasmā cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_19: Etthahi ‘‘kāyenā’’ti kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṁ dvāra rūpaṁ karaṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_20: Tasmā cakkhunāti vacane upacāra vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṁpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_21: Tathā cakkhunāti pade cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_23: Evañca sati, kāya kammenavandāmi, vacīkammena vandāmi, manokammena vandāmi, tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_24: Sabbamidaṁ indriya saṁvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:54_25: Cakkhunāti idaṁ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati.
anya-e0401n0:54_26: Kasmā, cakkhussa dassanasaṅkhātassa cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu purejātindriyapaccayavisesattā.
anya-e0401n0:55_0: Kāyenavandati, vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṁkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṁ kiñcāpi sahajāta cetanā kammena jātaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_2: Evaṁ santepi taṁ rūpa dvayaṁ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma, vacīvandanākamma siddhiyā upanissaya paccayaviseso hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_3: Yathātaṁ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṁ taṁ kammesu mātuyā bala vūpanissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_4: Evañca katvā taṁ rūpadvayaṁ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_5: Tasmā ‘kāyena, vācāyā,ti idaṁpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_6: Kāyenāti pana kāyakammenāti atthe sati, tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:55_8: Kasmā cetanāhaṁ bhikkhave kammaṁ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti ‘kāyena, vācāya, manasāti imasmiṁ sutte yathāhi ‘‘cetayitvā’’ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā .
anya-e0401n0:55_9: ‘‘Kammaṁ karotī’’ti pacchimaṁ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_7: ‘‘Paramatthadhamme evā’’ti dve me bhikkhave puggalā, tayomebhikkhave puggalātiādinā paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_17: Desetabbappakārānaṁ anavasesavibhattivasena atirekatā, suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā pavattivasena visesatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0401n0:57_19: Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha ‘‘na hi manussā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_20: Tattha ‘‘na hi manussā paṭiggahetuṁ sakkontī’’ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:57_23: ‘‘Ekamātikānu bandhā’’ti kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammātiādikaṁ ekaṁ abhidhamma mātikaṁ anugatā.
anya-e0401n0:57_27: Ādimhiyevatattha kenaṭṭhena abhidhammo, dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhe nā-ti vatvā tadatthaṁ vitthārento suttañhi patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā, nanippadesena.
anya-e0401n0:57_28: Abhidhammaṁ patvā pana nippadesatova vibhattā-ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_30: ‘‘Dhammo panā’’ti pāḷidvayamāha.‘‘Evaṁ santepī’’ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ evaṁ vicāritepisati.
anya-e0401n0:57_35: Lokasmiṁ kenaci samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_36: Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṁ desanā vidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_37: Tattha, yo pana bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso-tiādinā nayena pavattaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_38: Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccānī-tiādikaṁ desanāvidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_39: Tadubhayaṁpi koci bhindituṁ pārājikaṁ vā bhikkhuṁ apārājikaṁ kātuṁ catussaccaṁ vā dhammaṁ asaccaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_40: Atha kho karontoyeva devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_41: Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṁ suddhaṁ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_43: Evaṁ kenaci paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā tadubhayaṁpi appaṭivattiyaṁ cakkaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_44: ‘‘Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla’’nti vinaye ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_45: Bhikkhu saṅghe paññāyante tividhopisaddhammopaññāyati, tividhaṁpi satthusāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:57_47: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:57_50: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo pabbajjaṁ nalabheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_52: Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṁ āyācanaṁ upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:57_60: So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n0:57_62: Etthapikecivadanti vassasahassameva sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati, tatoparaṁ ekadivasa mattaṁpi na tiṭṭhati, antaradhāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_66: Idaṁpi tesaṁ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_68: ‘‘Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā’’ti vassasahassameva saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_69: Tatoparaṁ pana na tiṭṭheyya, anukkamena parihāyamāno gaccheyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:57_70: Kathaṁ pana aparihāyamāno tiṭṭhati, kathañca parihāyamāno gacchatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:57_78: Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena sesānaṁ catunnaṁ saṅghānaṁ khettāni jātāni.
anya-e0401n0:57_79: Evaṁ tatoparaṁ parihāyamāno gacchatīti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_81: ‘‘Saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā’’ti ettha tividho saddhammo ‘pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, paṭivedhasaddhammo,ti.
anya-e0401n0:57_82: So eva tividhaṁ sāsananti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:57_86: Bhikkhū ca pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_87: Kathañcidaṁ sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ ekadivasaṁpi na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_88: Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā etarahi sandhissanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_89: Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_90: Pariyattiyāca paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:57_92: So puttadhītu paramparānaṁ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṁ bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:57_93: Potthakesu ca tesaṁ pavattiṁ paripuṇṇaṁ likhitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0401n0:57_94: Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_96: Tatthahi nidhīnaṁnidhānabhūmisadisaṁ tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ, dhanaratanasadisāni dhammaratanāni.
anya-e0401n0:57_97: Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṁsejāto balasampanno puriso potthakaṁ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_98: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṁ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_99: Labhamāne ca sati, kathaṁ tānidhammaratanāni antarahitāni.
anya-e0401n0:57_100: Sīmānañca pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_102: Yañca vuttaṁ-pañcevavassasatānisaddhammo ṭhassatīti ca, - vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyāti ca.
anya-e0401n0:57_103: Idañca vacanaṁ dhammacakkameva hoti, na āṇācakkaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_104: Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_105: Āṇācakkabhūtāya kammavācāya samūhananena vā, sāsanassa vā antaradhānena.
anya-e0401n0:57_107: Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena paricchinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_108: Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṁ āṇācakkaṁ vigataṁ hoti, antaradhāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_109: Dhammacakkaṁ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo viya.
anya-e0401n0:57_110: Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto.
anya-e0401n0:57_112: Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:57_113: Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṁ devamanussānaṁ nānā bāhirakehi janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_114: Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṁsāre anantāsu lokadhātūsu sabbaṁlokattayappavattiñca, sabbaṁdhammappavattiñca, sabbaññutaññāṇānugatikena sutamayaññāṇena jānanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_115: Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni ārabhanti, pabbajanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_121: Kasmā, yathā dhammaṁ yathā vinayaṁ paṭipajjanato.
anya-e0401n0:57_122: Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṁ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya saṁvattanikattāti.
anya-e0401n0:57_123: Ettāvatā sabbaṁ micchāvādīnaṁ micchāvacanaṁ vidhamitaṁviddhaṁsitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:59_9: Evaṁtīsu atthavikappesu pathamassa kālavirodhaṁ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṁ saddatovirodhaṁ vattuṁ ‘‘nacā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:59_10: Tattha ‘‘ādimhi yevā’’ti etena yadākadāci paccāmasanaṁ appadhānanti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:59_11: ‘‘Appadhānapadānī’’ti abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti imasmiṁ ekasmiṁ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni.
anya-e0401n0:59_12: Tattha sabbathāpi vuttāti yojite sati, tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṁ abhidhammattha padevā sabbathā mayā vuttāti attho hoti.
anya-e0401n0:59_14: Tasmiṁ abhidhamme buddhena bhagavatā sabbathā vuttāti attho yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:59_17: Tattha, ‘‘evañhisatī’’ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṁ paccāmasante sati.
anya-e0401n0:59_20: ‘‘Paṭikkhittā hoti’’ tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:59_21: Na kevalaṁ so eva doso āpajjati.
anya-e0401n0:60_2: Visesanapadaṁ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati kaṇhokāko, setobako,ti.
anya-e0401n0:60_3: Katthaci aññanivattanatthāya vā payujjati nīlopaṭo, nīlaṁpuppha, nti.
anya-e0401n0:60_6: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṁ janānaṁ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi sijjhatīti āha ‘‘tecamahājanā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_11: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:60_13: Sammutisaccanti vuccanti, sammatattā sammuti ca, sā saccānaṁ vatthubhūtattā saccañcāti katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_15: ‘‘Sammāpaṭipajjantā’’ti pāṇo nahantabbo, sabbesattā averā hontūtiādinā sammāpaṭipajjantā.
anya-e0401n0:60_20: ‘‘Evaṁ mahantaṁ sammuti sacca’’nti etena ahaṁ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_25: Bhavanibbattakaṁ kusalākusalakammaṁ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_28: ‘‘Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī’’ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi vipallāsānaṁ vatthubhāvena gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_30: ‘‘Evaṁ viparītañhi sammutisacca’’nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṁ gahetvā paramattha saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_33: Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_34: Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṁ saṁsaranti sandhāvantīti gaṇhantosassatadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_38: Sabbākārato sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_41: Sātato vā anubhavanaṁ, assātato vā, majjhattato vā.
anya-e0401n0:60_46: ‘‘Kusalasammatā’’ti etena sabhāvasaccepi etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_49: Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo ‘‘oghanīyayoganīya upādānīyatā’’.
anya-e0401n0:60_53: Sattasantānapariyāpannā pana rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti atthena ajjhattāti lokasammuti hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_55: Dukkhanirodha maggabhāvo ca, iti idaṁ catukkaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:60_58: Tebhūmaka dhammānaṁ sukhatā nāma calā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_60: Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṁ karontā acireneva dukkhaṁ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n0:60_61: Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṁ pāpuṇantīti natthi.
anya-e0401n0:60_65: ‘‘Yo vinā aññāpadesenā’’ti ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṁ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṁ paññāyati, paṭasaṇṭhānaṁ paññāyati, taṁ saṇṭhānaṁ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_72: ‘‘Cittenaparikappetvā’’ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṁ saṇṭhānaṁ vijjamānaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_75: ‘‘Cittamayocittanimmito’’ti supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito.
anya-e0401n0:60_77: ‘‘Santī’’ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_84: Tattha, imasmiṁ buddhasāsane pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhijānanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_89: Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:60_94: Tesu dhammesu tesaṁ kiccānaṁ siddhiyā imasmiṁ sāsane sāsanakiccaṁ siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_96: Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṁ sāsana kiccānaṁ avirādhakattā avisaṁvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:60_99: ‘‘Tassā’’ti tassaabhiññeyyassa, tassapariññeyyassa, tassapahātabbassa, tassasacchikā tabbassa tassabhāvetabbassāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:61_4: Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n0:61_5: Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā.
anya-e0401n0:61_6: Sabbaññubuddhānaṁ catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_7: Paccekabuddhānaṁ catusacca sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_8: Tasmā te sayaṁ paṭividdhaṁ catusacca dhammaṁ nāma paññattiṁ nīharitvā paresaṁ desetuṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:61_9: Tesaṁ catusaccasambodho mūgassa supinadassanaṁ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:61_10: Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya dhammā eva sabbaññutaññāṇassa gocarāti sakkāvattunti.
anya-e0401n0:63_3: Cintetīti vutte kiṁ cinteti, ārammaṇaṁ cintetīti evaṁ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:63_4: Tasmā idha cintanāti daṭṭhabbā, tasmā assa nāmaṁ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:63_5: Sutamayaññāṇaṁ, cintāmayaññāṇa, nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi, sāpaññāevāti taṁ nivattetuṁ ‘‘ārammaṇa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:63_7: Cittaṁ, mano, mānasaṁ, viññāṇa, nti sabbaṁ cittassa nāmaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_11: Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṁ nahotīti dassetuṁ ‘‘santesu cā’’tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_12: ‘‘Etenā’’ti idaṁ kattuno kiriyāsādhane atissayūpakārakaṁ karaṇa sādhanaṁ vadatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘tañhī’’tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_13: ‘‘Cintanamatta’’nti ettha mattasaddo visesanivatti atthoti, tena nivattitaṁ atthaṁ dasseti ‘‘sabbepihī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:63_21: ‘‘Ekaṁ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhatī’’ti idaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ taṁ kiriyā mattabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_22: Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi pana te dhammāsayaṁ nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā.
anya-e0401n0:63_23: Tasmā paramattha padesupi yathārahaṁ tadaññasādhanānaṁ paṭilābho avārito hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_24: Itarathā hetu paccayo, ārammaṇa paccayo, sahajātapaccayo, nissayapaccayotiādīsu kathaṁ bhāvasādhanaṁ yuttaṁ siyāti.
anya-e0401n0:63_26: ‘‘Abhedassa cintanassabhedakaraṇa’’nti idaṁ cintetīti cittantikataṁ kattusādhanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_28: Tassa sarīraṁ nāma visuṁ aṅgaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_31: Payojane sati vattabbaṁ, asati na vattabbanti āha ‘‘tathākaraṇañcā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_34: kappanāyā’’ti sace attā atthi, attā cinteti, tasmā attā cittonāmātiādi vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_35: Na vattabbaṁ cintetīti cittanti, cittassa kiriyāmattattā.
anya-e0401n0:63_36: Na pana attādiko kattā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_37: Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṁ katvā ‘‘cintetīti citta’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_39: Idaṁ abhedassabheda parikappanāya payojananti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_40: ‘‘Attappadhāno’’ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṁkārakānaṁ majjhe sayaṁpadhāno sayaṁjeṭṭhako hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:63_43: Evaṁ cittassa vacanatthaṁ dassetvā idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṁ dassento ‘‘apicetthā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:63_44: Yathayidaṁ ye ime tiracchānagatā pāṇā cittāvicittā.
anya-e0401n0:63_45: Evaṁ cittaṁ vicittaṁ yaṁ aññaṁ atthi, taṁ aññaṁ ekanikāyaṁpi nasamanupassāmī-ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:63_47: Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṁ vadati. Gāthāyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_49: ‘‘Kiccasampattiyoraso’’ti tena tena dhammena karaṇakiccañca, taṁ kiccaṁ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca.
anya-e0401n0:63_50: Aggissa vatthumhi paripācanakiccaṁ viya, obhāsanaguṇoviya ca.
anya-e0401n0:63_51: ‘‘Gayhākāro’’ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto ākāro.
anya-e0401n0:63_54: ‘‘Āsannakāraṇa’’nti attano anantare phalanibbattakaṁ kāraṇaṁ, aggissa aggikāraka puriso viya.
anya-e0401n0:65_13: ‘‘Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā’’ti ārammaṇaṁ vijānantaṁ cittaṁ phusanākāraṁ janetvāva vijānāti.
anya-e0401n0:65_15: Avasesā pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṁ paṭicca uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:65_16: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:65_19: Evaṁ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:65_22: Paripuṇṇāni ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:65_23: Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṁ vaṭṭatīti āha ‘‘taṁ nasundara’’nti.
anya-e0401n0:65_26: Vijānanamattaṁ cittaṁ, kusalanti vā akusalanti vā vattabbaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:65_27: Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:67_4: Dhātukkho bhavasenāti vuttaṁ hoti, ‘‘kenaruppatī’’ti ettha ‘‘kenā’’ti hetu atthevā hetu kattarivā karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:67_6: Ḍaṁsamakasā nāma sūcimukhā khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca.
anya-e0401n0:67_11: Maraṇaṁ vā gacchati, maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:67_15: Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṁ mukhyaruppanaṁ saṁsandento ‘‘samāgamo cā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_16: Samāgamo ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṁ vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:67_18: ‘‘Mahābhūtānameva vā’’ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ mahābhūtānameva vā.
anya-e0401n0:67_20: ‘‘Sayaṁpi vikārapattā hontī’’ti temahābhūtāsayaṁpi pakatiṁ vijahitvā omattādhimattabhāvaṁ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:67_22: Evaṁ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṁ vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu, sampatti vā.
anya-e0401n0:67_23: Purimapacchi masantatīnaṁ visadisappavattibhūto vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṁnāmāti katvā puna taṁ ruppanaṁ dassento ‘‘apicetthā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_24: ‘‘Ghaṭṭanavasena ruppana dhammāna mevā’’ti āpātāgamanādivasena ruppanadhammehivinā abhighaṭṭanavasenaruppana sabhāvānaṁ rūpadhammānameva siddhanti pucchā.
anya-e0401n0:67_31: Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova pavattati.
anya-e0401n0:67_34: Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti.
anya-e0401n0:68_0: ‘‘Sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenā’’ti sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatītiādinā lokassa paccakkhato pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena.
anya-e0401n0:68_1: Tañhi vacanaṁ lokassa apākaṭaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ ruppanaṁ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:68_6: Evaṁ santepi pāḷisādhakaṁ nāma na sakkāsabbattha laddhuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:68_12: ‘‘Anuggahānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasenā’’ti kiñcāpipāḷiyaṁ sītādivacanaṁ upaghātakānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:68_16: ‘‘Pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhānī’’ti sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:68_18: Nīlaṁpi sañjānāti, pītampi sañjānātī-tiādinā ca, vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:68_20: Madhuraṁpi vijānāti, ambilaṁpi vijānātī-tiādinā ca-pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0401n0:70_3: Na hi atīta dhammā, nibbāyanti nāma, satte pīḷetvā niruddhattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:70_4: Paccuppannā ca dhammā etarahi pīḷenti, avassaṁ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti, kathaṁ te nibbāyanti nāmāti āha ‘‘paccuppannesu…pe…
anya-e0401n0:70_7: Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṁ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_8: Tena pana vinā aññattha taṁ kiriyaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_10: Yathā sakuṇānaṁ pakkhana kiriyā nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:70_11: Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṁ nibbuti kiriyāpi nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘yehite’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:70_17: Tasmā nibbānaṁ tesaṁ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:70_20: ‘‘Taṁ taṁ kilesānaṁ vā’’ti te saṁtesaṁkilesānaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:70_22: ‘‘Punaappaṭisandhikabhāva’’nti santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṁ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā.
anya-e0401n0:70_23: Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṁ dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:70_27: Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṁ na dissati, karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva abhāvatoti dassetuṁ ‘‘na ca nibbāna’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:70_30: Saccaṁ, tattha pana visesane karaṇa vacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:73_6: ‘‘Bhavanikanti nāma hotī’’ti bhavasaṅkhātaṁ attano khandhaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:73_13: ‘‘Tīsubhavesu uppannānipī’’ti kāmarūpārūpasattasantānesu uppannānipi na tatrapariyā pannāneva honti.
anya-e0401n0:73_16: ‘‘Rūpāvacaratādimuttidoso’’ti ime rūpāvacara dhammā na honti, arūpāvacara dhammā na honti, lokuttara dhammā na hontīti evaṁ vattabbatāpatti dosoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_19: Kasmā, loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṁpi sabbhāvāti imamatthaṁ vadanto ‘‘nanuyebhūyya vuttivasenapī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:73_20: Tattha ‘‘kesañcī’’ti kesañci puggalānaṁ vā dhammānaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:73_21: Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā vanacarakoti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_22: Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā saṅgāmāvacaroti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_24: Yasmiṁ vane ambarukkhāpi atthi, aññarukkhāpi atthi.
anya-e0401n0:73_25: Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṁ vanaṁ ambavananti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_28: Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa nāmaṁ labhanti, dhammā yebhūyyanayena kāmāvacarādi nāmaṁ labhantīti.
anya-e0401n0:73_29: Evaṁ gahite sati, te dosānā pajjantīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmā idhapi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:73_35: ‘‘Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato’’ti tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_39: Kāma taṇhāya gocaravisayattā kāmāvacaranti ayamatthopi sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:74_5: ‘‘Avacaratī’’ti tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattatīti imamatthaṁ vadati ‘‘rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṁnayo netabbo’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:74_10: Arūpassa avacaraṁ arūpāvacaranti imamatthaṁ dīpeti ‘‘tesu panā’’tiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:74_12: Yadipi lobho, rāgo, kāmo, taṇhā, tisabbampetaṁ lobhassavevacanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:74_13: Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṁ vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṁ daññolobho gayhati.
anya-e0401n0:75_1: ‘‘Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā’’ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:75_6: ‘‘Yaṁ etasmiṁ antare’’ti ye etasmiṁ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā.
anya-e0401n0:75_7: Yaṁ rūpaṁ, yā vedanā, yāsaññā, ye saṅkhārā, yaṁviññāṇanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:76_9: Nibbānaṁ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:76_10: So ca apariyāpannabhāvo, visuṁ ekācatutthī avatthā bhūmināmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:78_2: ‘‘Sabbahīna’’nti lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṁ.
anya-e0401n0:78_5: ‘‘Vīthicittavasenāti etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti evaṁ pavattassa bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena.
anya-e0401n0:78_6: Evañcasati, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṁ vacaneti āha ‘‘akusalesu panā’’tiādiṁ .‘‘Dvīhivaṭṭamūlehī’’ti lobhamohasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi.
anya-e0401n0:79_2: Sumanassabhāvoti vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘mānasika…pe…
anya-e0401n0:79_6: Kathaṁ pana bhāvo pavattinimittaṁ nāmahotīti āha ‘‘bhavanti…pe…
anya-e0401n0:79_14: Ettha siyā, ‘‘etasminti nimitte bhumma’’nti vuttaṁ, nimittañcanāma akārakaṁ asādhanaṁ, taṁ kathaṁ sādhanaviggahe yujjatīti.
anya-e0401n0:79_16: Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti vadanti.
anya-e0401n0:79_18: Suṭṭhu karoti, pakatipaccayena anipphannaṁ kammaṁ attano balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro.
anya-e0401n0:79_27: ‘‘Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kamme payojetītikatvā idha saṅkhāro nāmā’’ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:79_32: ‘‘Yo pana tenasahito’’tiādinā pubbevuttamevatthaṁ pakārantarenapākaṭaṁ kātuṁ ‘‘sopana yadā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_35: Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha ‘‘yasmiṁ samaye’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_39: Kasmā, pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi asaṁsandanattā, atthayuttibyañjanayuttīnañca avisadattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:79_51: Sāsavā dhammā, sārammaṇā dhammātyādīsuviyāti pana vutte yuttataraṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_53: Apicayatthavisuddhimaggādīsu asaṅkhāraṁ cittaṁ, sasaṅkhāraṁ cittanti āgataṁ.
anya-e0401n0:80_2: ‘‘Na pana te bhedavantā hontī’’ti kasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:80_3: Na nu tepicakkhu samphasso, sotasamphasso, tiādinā ca, kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, tiādinā ca, dukkhe aññāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇa, ntiādināca bhedavantā hontīti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:80_4: Te pana bhedā imaṁ cittaṁ bhinnaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0401n0:80_6: Na ca tesaṁ ayaṁ vikappo atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:80_16: Kasmā, vedanāya ca sayaṁ bhedavantattā, diṭṭhisaṅkhārānañca vikappasabbhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:81_2: Somanassuppattiyā kāraṇe vutte taṁ sahagata cittuppattiyāpikāraṇaṁ siddhaṁ hotīti katvā tameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:81_5: ārammaṇena samāyogo, tena samāyuttassāpi cittaṁ uppajjamānantiādinā vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:81_12: ‘‘Cintā pasutavasenā’’ti gambhīresu dhammesu cintāpasavanavasena, vīmaṁsā vaḍḍhanavasena.
anya-e0401n0:81_16: Adiṭṭhajjhāsayatā, diṭṭhivipannapuggalaparivajjanatā, saddhammasavanatā, sammāvitakkabahulatā, yoniso ummujjanañca diṭṭhivippayogakāraṇanti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:82_0: ‘‘Imesaṁ pana cittānaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimaggegahetabba’’nti visuddhi maggekhandha niddesato gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:82_2: Yadā hinatthikāmesu ādīnavotiādinānayena micchādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāmevā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sāratopacceti sabhāva tikkhena anussāhitenacittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_5: Yadā micchā diṭṭhiṁ apurekkhitvā kevalaṁ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṁ vā sevati, para sampattiṁ vā abhijjhāyati, parabhaṇḍaṁ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_8: Yadā pana kāmānaṁ vā asampattiṁ āgamma aññesaṁ vā somanassahetūnaṁ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitāhonti , tadāsesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:84_3: Dummanassa bhāvoti vutte kāyikadukkhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘mānasika…pe…
anya-e0401n0:85_7: Evaṁ sahagatappasaṅgaṁ nivattetvā sampayuttappasaṅgaṁ nivattetuṁ ‘‘paṭighaggahaṇaṁpī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_9: Ādikappato paṭṭhāya manussānaṁ yathākāma paribhogatthāya lokissariyenathāvaraṭṭhāyinā nimmitattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:85_14: Purimacittassalobhasahagatabhāvo imāniaṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittānināmāti iminā cūḷanigamane neva siddhoviyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:85_15: Cūḷanigamanena paṭighasampayutta bhāvesiddhe domanassasahagatabhāvopi tenasiddho yevāti katvā ‘‘tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_17: Imasmiṁ citte issāmacchariyakukkuccānicathinamiddhāni ca aniyatayogīni ca honti yevāpanakāni ca.
anya-e0401n0:85_19: Domanassaṁ imasmiṁ citte atthi, aññacittesu natthi, tasmā asādhāraṇa dhammo nāma.
anya-e0401n0:85_21: ‘‘Yathātaṁ’’ti taṁ nidassanaṁ tadudāharaṇaṁ yathā katamanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:85_27: So ātapattaṁ laddhoti vutte sabbaṁ rājasampattiṁ laddhoti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:85_28: Tasmā idaṁ upalakkhaṇa vacanaṁ jātanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_30: Pubbe domanassasahagatanti vatvā nigamane paṭighasampayuttacittānīti vuttattā ‘‘imassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:86_1: ‘‘Aniṭṭhalokadhammehī’’ti alābho ca, ayasoca, nindāca, dukkhañcāti catūhi aniṭṭhalokadhammehi.
anya-e0401n0:86_2: ‘‘Taṁ kutettha labbhā’’ti ahaṁ alābhādīhi māsamāgacchīti patthentassapi kutomeetthaloketaṁ patthanā pūraṇaṁ sabbakālaṁ labbhāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:86_4: Imesaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimagge saṅkhepatova vuttaṁ tassa pāṇāti pātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavattiveditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:88_4: Evaṁ nu kho, aññathānu khoti evaṁ dvidhā erayati kampatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:88_7: Idañhi paṭighasampayuttaṁ viya nigamanena siddhaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:88_8: ‘‘Idha laddhokāsaṁ hutvā’’ti mūlantara virahattā eva idhaladdhokāsaṁ hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:88_9: Pakati sabhāvabhūtaṁ, iti tasmā natthīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:88_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ saṅkhāra bhedena avijjāya duvidhabhāvova vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_18: Avijjā appaṭipatti micchā paṭipattito duvidhā tathā sasaṅkhā rāsaṅkhāratoti vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_20: Imesaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimaggesaṅkhepatovavuttaṁ tassaasanniṭṭhānavikkhepakālepavatti veditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:89_1: ‘‘Sabbathāpī’’ti nipātasamudāyo vā hotu aññamaññavevacano vā, visuṁ nipātovāti evaṁ sabbappakāratopi.
anya-e0401n0:89_7: ‘‘Niyāmaṁ okkamantāpī’’ti pañcānantariya kammabhāvena niyatamicchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca niyāmaṁ okkamantāpi.
anya-e0401n0:89_14: ‘‘Siyu’’nti padaṁ dhātupaccayehi siddhaṁ nipphannapadaṁ nāma nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:92_9: Ettha ca viññāṇāni ekavatthu nissitāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:92_17: Takkiriyāti ca sukhakiriyā dukkha kiriyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:92_19: Ca saddo okāsatthoti katvā ‘‘dukkaraṁ okāsadāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:93_7: Tasmā āloko tesaṁ visayavisayībhāvūpagamane sannissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:93_10: Imesaṁ aṅgānaṁ yutti dīpanā uparirūpasaṅgahe āgamissati.
anya-e0401n0:93_12: Tattha ‘‘tasmiṁ pana āpātaṁ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ nuppajjatī’’ti vacanaṁ asambhāvento ‘‘taṁ vinā ālokenā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:94_4: Pubbe katakammaṁ idāni nibbattiṁ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:94_7: Idha panasā cetanā samaṅgitāya saṅgahitāti katvā ‘‘catasso samaṅgithā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:94_9: ‘‘Taṁ taṁ kammāyūhana kāle’’ti pāṇāti pātādikassa tabbiramaṇādikassa ca tassa tassa duccaritasucaritakammassa āyūhanakāle.
anya-e0401n0:94_11: ‘‘Sabbaso abhāvaṁ patvāna nirujjhatī’’ti yathā abyākata dhammānirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṁ patvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n0:94_13: ‘‘Sabbākāra paripūra’’nti pāṇātipātaṁ karontassa kammānu rūpābahūkāya vacīmano vikārā sandissanti.
anya-e0401n0:95_2: ‘‘Khīraṁ vamuccatī’’ti yathā khīraṁ nāma imasmiṁ divase muccati.
anya-e0401n0:95_5: Na tathā pāpaṁ kataṁ kammanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:95_9: ‘‘Visuṁ eko paramattha dhammotipi saṅkhyaṁ na gacchatī’’ti visuṁ sampayutta dhamma bhāvena saṅkhyaṁ na gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:95_10: So hi kammapaccayadhammattā paramattha dhammo na hotīti na vattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:95_13: ‘‘Ta’’nti kammaṁ vā, kammanimittaṁ vā, gatinimittaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:96_7: Pakkhantarena sādhāraṇatā nāmapakkhantarassa nānappakārato sajjanameva lagganamevāti vuttaṁ byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevatthoti.
anya-e0401n0:96_9: Akusalahetūhi ca sahetukatā sambhavo natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:98_0: Yadi hi ayamatthosiyā, evañcasati, ayamattho āpajjatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:98_8: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacuticittāni nāma kevalaṁ kammavegukkhittabhāvenasantānepatitamattattā dubbala kiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_9: Pañca viññāṇāni ca asārānaṁ abalānaṁ pasādavatthūnaṁ nissāya uppannattā dubbalavatthukāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_10: Sampaṭicchanādīni ca pañcaviññāṇānubandha mattattā dubbala kiccaṭṭhānāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_11: Tasmā tāni sabbāni attano ussāhenavinā kevalaṁ vipaccanamattena pavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:98_16: ‘‘Ussāharahitāni evā’’ti yathā rukkhānaṁ vātapupphāni nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:98_18: Tathā tāni ca vipākuppādakataṇhāsineharahitattā ussāhabyāpāra rahitāni eva.
anya-e0401n0:99_2: ‘‘Picupiṇḍakānaṁ viyā’’ti dvinnaṁ kappāsapicupiṇḍakānaṁ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṁ viya upādārūpānañca aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṁ dubbalamevāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:99_10: Kammānubhāvato ca muñcitvā yathāpurimaṁ vipākasantānaṁ kammānubhāvena pavattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:99_13: ‘‘Visadisacittasantāna parāvaṭṭanavasenā’’ti purimenavipāka citta santānena visadisaṁ kusalādi javana cittasantānaṁ parato āvaṭṭā pana vasena.
anya-e0401n0:99_14: Tathāhidaṁ cittadvayaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āvaṭṭanā, anvāvaṭṭanā, ābhogo, samannāhāroti niddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:99_16: ‘‘Attano pacchā pavattassa cittassa vasenā’’ti attano pacchā pavattaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca na vattabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:99_17: ‘‘Attano paccayehi eva so sakkā vattu’’nti attano paccayesu balavantesu sati, balavā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:99_18: Dubbalesu sati, dubbalo hotīti sakkāvattunti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:100_5: ‘‘Tānipi hi aparibyattakiccāniyevā’’ti ettha āvajjana dvayaṁ javanānaṁ purecārika kiccattā aparibyattakiccaṁ hotu.
anya-e0401n0:100_6: Hasituppādacittaṁ pana javanakiccattā kathaṁ aparibyattakiccaṁ bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:100_7: Tampi sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṁ anucārikamattattā aparibyattakiccaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:100_8: ‘‘Aṭṭhamahāvipākesu viya vattabbo’’ti mahāvipākānaṁ sasaṅkhārikā saṅkhārikabhāvo purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ārammaṇānaṁ payogena saha vā vinā vā upaṭṭhānaṁ paṭicca vutto, tathā vattabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:101_1: ‘‘Dubbala kammanibbattesū’’ti paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cutikiccāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:101_6: Chasuvatthu rūpesu hadayavatthumeva suvaṇṇarajataṁ viya sāravatthu hoti.
anya-e0401n0:101_7: Itarāni phalikāniviya pasādamattattā asārāni hontīti vuttaṁ ‘‘cakkhādīsu dubbalavatthūsū’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:101_8: Dassanādīni ca kiccāni javana kiccassa purecarattā khuddakiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:102_1: Idha dīpaniyaṁ iccevanti padaṁ aṭṭhārasātipadassavisesananti katvā ‘‘sabbathāpīti padassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:102_3: Vibhāvaniyaṁ pana taṁ sabbathāpīti padassa visesananti katvā ‘‘sabbathā pītikusalākusalavipākakiriyābhedenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:104_3: Yathā aṭṭhacittāni lokuttarānīti ca vutte avuttepisijjhanti sesacittāni lokiyānīti ca sauttarānīti cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:104_5: ‘‘Anicchante yevā’’ti sacepi avīcinimittassādavatthu viya keci icchantu.
anya-e0401n0:104_7: ‘‘Sobhagga pattiyā’’ti ettha subhagassa bhāvo sobhagganti viggaho.
anya-e0401n0:105_2: Ettha siyā jānātīti ñāṇanti vuttaṁ, kiṁ sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ yāthāvato jānātīti.
anya-e0401n0:105_5: Evaṁ sati, ñāṇena cintentānaṁ ajānanaṁ nāma natthi, virajjhanaṁ nāma natthīti āpajjati.
anya-e0401n0:105_6: Atha sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ yāthāvato na jānāti, katthaci jānāti, katthaci na jānāti.
anya-e0401n0:105_7: Evañcasati, yattha jānāti, tattheva taṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:105_8: Yattha na jānāti, tattha taṁ ñāṇameva na hotīti āpajjatīti. Vuccate .
anya-e0401n0:105_9: Ñāṇena cintessāmīti cintentānaṁpi yattha yattha yāthāvato jānanaṁ na hoti, tattha tattha ñāṇa vippayutta cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:105_10: Ñāṇappaṭi rūpakā ca dhammā atthi cittañca vitakko ca, vicāro ca, diṭṭhi ca.
anya-e0401n0:105_11: Etehi cintentāpi ahaṁ ñāṇena cintemīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n0:105_12: ‘‘Deyya dhammapaṭiggāhaka sampattī’’ti deyyadhamma vatthu sampatti, paṭiggāhaka puggala sampatti.
anya-e0401n0:105_13: ‘‘Abyāpajjalokūpapattitā’’ti ettha abyāpajjaloko nāma kāyikadukkha cetasika dukkha rahito uparidevaloko vā brahmaloko vā.
anya-e0401n0:105_16: Abyāpajjalokaṁ upapatti yassa so abyāpajja lokūpapatti.
anya-e0401n0:105_18: ‘‘Kilesa dūratā’’ti samāpatti balena vā, aññatarappaṭipattiyā vā, vikkhambhita kilesatā vā, ariyamaggena samucchinna kilesatā vā.
anya-e0401n0:106_0: Tesaṁ uppatti vidhānaṁ visuddhi magge khandhaniddese evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:106_1: Yadāhi deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādi sampattiṁ aññaṁ vā somanassahetuṁ āgamma haṭṭhatuṭṭho atthidinnantiādinayappavattaṁ sammādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā asaṁsīdanto anussāhitoparehi dānādīni puññāni karoti, tadāssa somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇa sampayuttaṁ cittaṁ asaṅkhāraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:106_2: Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā amutta cā gatādivasena saṁsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti, tadāssa tadeva cittaṁ sasaṅkhāraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:106_3: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṁ attano vā paresaṁ vā vasena pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:106_4: Yadā pana ñāti janassa paṭipatti dassanena jātaparicayābāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassa jātāsahasā kiñci deva hatthagataṁ dadanti vā vandanti vā, tadā tatīyaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n0:106_5: Yadā pana dethavandathāti ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṁ paṭipajjanti, tadā catutthaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n0:106_6: Yadā pana deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādīnaṁ asampattiṁ aññesaṁ vā somanassahetūnaṁ abhāvaṁ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:107_1: Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddena imāni cittāni na kevalaṁ aṭṭheva honti .
anya-e0401n0:107_2: Atha kho tato bahūnipi bahutarānipi hontīti imaṁ sampiṇḍanatthaṁ dīpetīti dassetuṁ ‘‘tenā’’tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:107_3: Dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhuju kammaṁ nāma ñāṇa kiccaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:107_4: Taṁ kathaṁ ñāṇa vippayutta cittehi karontīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:107_5: Ñāṇa sampayutta cittehi diṭṭhiṁ ujuṁkarontā tesaṁ antarantarā ñāṇasote patitavasena ñāṇavippayutta cittehipi karontiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:107_6: Sabbesattā kammassakātiādinā, buddho sobhagavā, svākkhāto so dhammo, suppaṭipanno so saṅgho, tiādinā cāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:107_8: Tattha dasapuññakiriyavatthūni nāma ‘dānaṁ, sīlaṁ, bhāvanā, apacāyanaṁ, veyyāvaccaṁ, pattidānaṁ, pattānumodanaṁ, dhammassavanā, dhammadesanā, diṭṭhuju kammaṁ,.
anya-e0401n0:107_11: Tīṇi ca kammāni karontā te heva aṭṭhahi karonti.
anya-e0401n0:107_12: Tāniyeva ca sabbāni atthi hīnāni, atthi majjhimāni, atthi paṇītāni.
anya-e0401n0:107_13: Tasmā puna anukkamena ārammaṇādīhi vaḍḍhanaṁ karoti.
anya-e0401n0:107_17: Tathā ñāṇavippayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṁ saṭṭhi ca hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:107_21: ‘‘Nānāvajjanavīthiya’’nti ñāṇavippayutta vīthīhi visuṁ bhūtāya āvajjanāya yutta vīthiyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:108_8: Evaṁ pariyāyattha saṅkhātaṁ abhidhānatthaṁ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṁ vacanatthaṁ dasseti kucchitetiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:108_10: Cālenti tadaṅgappahānavasena, kampenti vikkhambhanappahānavasena, viddhaṁsenti samucchedappahānavasena.
anya-e0401n0:108_15: Tattha, kusalassa paṇḍitassa bhāvo ekāsallaṁ. Ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:108_16: Tena sambhūtaṁ sañjātaṁ kosalla sambhūtaṁ tiviggaho.
anya-e0401n0:109_2: ‘‘Dubbala kammenā’’ti tihetukomakena vā dvihetuka kusala kammena vā.
anya-e0401n0:109_3: ‘‘Kehici ācariyehī’’ti moravāpi vāsī mahādattattheraṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:110_6: Bhūtakathana visesanaṁ tena nivattetabbassa atthassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:110_8: ‘‘Byavacchedakavisesana’’nti ahetuka vipākakiriya cittānañca sabbhāvātappasaṅgassa avacchedakaṁ visesanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:110_9: ‘‘Yathā sakkhara kathalikaṁpi macchagumbaṁpi tiṭṭhantaṁpi carantaṁpi passatī’’ti vacane sakkhara kathalikaṁ tiṭṭhantaṁ, macchagumbaṁ tiṭṭhantaṁpi carantaṁpi passatīti evaṁ yathā lābha yojanā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:111_1: ‘‘Yadida’’nti yā ayaṁ dīpana samatthatā, ‘‘idaṁ sāmatthiya’’nti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:112_2: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṁ pariyantaṁ karitvā uparito paranimmita vasavattideve anto karitvāti evaṁ pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhattā idhakāmasaddena sahokāsākāmabhūmi vuccatīti āha ‘‘kāme kāmabhūmiya’’nti.
anya-e0401n0:112_4: ‘‘Kriyā cā’’ti ettha ca saddo pana saddattho.
anya-e0401n0:112_9: Bhavo nāma indriya baddhasantānagato dhamma samūho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:112_10: Idha pana kāmāvacarā dhammāti pade kāmasaddo.
anya-e0401n0:112_11: So ca pathavi pabbatādīhi saddhiṁ sabbaṁ kāmabhūmiṁ vadatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘bhūmipariyāyo cā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:112_12: ‘‘Indriyānindriyabaddha dhamma samūho’’ti indriyabaddha dhamma samūho sattasantānāgato, anindriyabaddha dhamma samūho pathavi pabbatādi gato.
anya-e0401n0:114_4: Pañcannañhi ekato sāmaggiyaṁ satiyeva appanā hoti, no asati.
anya-e0401n0:114_5: Sāmaggiyanti ca suṭṭhu balavatāya samaggabhāveti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_7: Jhānaṁ duvidhaṁ ārammaṇūpanijjhānañca lakkhaṇū panijjhānañcāti āha ‘‘kasiṇādikassā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:114_9: Upanijjhānanti ca kasiṇa nimittādikaṁ ārammaṇaṁ cetasā upagantvānijjhānaṁ olokanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:114_11: Agginā viya kaṭṭhānaṁ kilesānaṁ dayhanatoti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_12: Ekaggatā eva sātissaya yuttā appanāpattakāleti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:114_13: Pubbabhāge pana pathamajjhāne vitakkassa balavabhāvo icchitabbo.
anya-e0401n0:115_5: Sāyeva ekaggatā ekaggatā, samādhī,ti ca vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:115_8: Samasaddo pana dhammena samena rajjaṁ kāretītiādīsu viya nāmikasaddoti dvidhā vikappaṁ dassento ‘‘sāyeva citta’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:115_9: Sāyeva cittaṁ-sammā ca ādhiyatīti samādhi, sāyeva cittaṁ-samañca ādhiyatīti samādhīti dvidhā vikappo.
anya-e0401n0:115_15: ‘‘Līnuddhaccābhāvā pādanenā’’ti līnassa ca uddhaccassa ca abhāvo līnuddhaccābhāvo.
anya-e0401n0:115_20: Iti evaṁ imesu dvīsu atthesu ekaggatā eva sātissayayuttāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:115_21: Evaṁ pana sati, ekaggatā eva jhānanti vattabbā, na vitakkādayoti codanaṁ pariharanto ‘‘vitakkādayopanā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:115_28: ‘‘Saṁsappitu’’nti evaṁ nu kho aññathānu khoti dvidhā cañcalituṁ.
anya-e0401n0:116_0: Evaṁ upanijjhānatthaṁ dassetvā jhāpanatthaṁ dassento ‘‘tesu cā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:116_3: Pageva kāyavacīdvāresūti evaṁ sambhāvanattho cettha pisaddo.
anya-e0401n0:116_5: ‘‘Jhāpitā nāma hontī’’ti jhānaṅga dhammaggīhi daḍḍhānāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:116_6: ‘‘Evaṁ santepi tesaṁ samudāye eva jhāna vohāro siddho’’ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:116_7: ‘‘Dhamma sāmaggipadhāna’’nti jhānaṭṭhāne jhānaṅga dhammānaṁ maggaṭṭhāne maggaṅga dhammānaṁ bodhiṭṭhāne bojjhaṅga dhammānaṁ samaggabhāvappadhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:117_0: Evaṁ saṅgahakārānaṁ matiyā jhānaṁ vatvā idāni aparesānaṁ matiyā taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apare’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:117_10: Jhānapaccayoti jhānaṅgānijhānasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0401n0:117_11: Maggapaccayoti maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ maggapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0401n0:118_2: ‘‘Aṅga bhedo’’ti pathamajjhāne pañca aṅgāni, dutīyajjhāne cattāri aṅgānī tiādiko aṅgabhedo.
anya-e0401n0:118_8: ‘‘Vitakke nibbindatī’’ti oḷārikovatāyaṁ vitakko, nīvaraṇānaṁ āsanne ṭhitoti evaṁ vitakke ādīnavaṁ disvā nibbindati.
anya-e0401n0:118_11: Vitakkavirāgo ca so bhāvanā cāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:118_13: Ajjhāsaya balena pādakajjhānasadisaṁ na hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:119_2: ‘‘Saṅkhāra bhedo na vutto’’ti pathamajjhāna kusala cittaṁ asaṅkhārikamekaṁ, sasaṅkhārikamekantiādinā na vuttoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:119_12: ‘‘Kāmādīnavadassanādinā’’ti aṅgārakāsū pamākāmābahudukkhābahupāyāsā, ādīnavo etthabhiyyotiādinā kāmesuādīnavaṁ disvā.
anya-e0401n0:119_15: Ettha abhiññābhedena saṅkhāra bhedo na vattabbo, paṭipadā bhedeneva vattabboti dassetuṁ ‘‘khippābhiññajjhānānaṁpī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_18: Dandhā asīghā abhiññā yesaṁ tāni dandhābhiññāni. Jhānāni.
anya-e0401n0:119_19: ‘‘Yadi eva’’nti evaṁ paṭipadā bhedena saṅkhāra bhedo yadi siyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:119_25: ‘‘Satthena hanitvā’’ti pare na satthena hananato chindanato.
anya-e0401n0:119_28: Anāgāmino hi suddha vipassanāyānikāpi samānā samādhismiṁ paripūrakārino nāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:119_29: Icchante susati kiñci nimittaṁ ārabbhamanasikāra mattenapi jhānaṁ ijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:119_31: ‘‘Rūpībrahmaloke’’ti idaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁpi tattha pākatikabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_32: Arūpī brahmaloke pana ekā eva samāpatti pākatikāsambhavati.
anya-e0401n0:119_33: Upapattisiddhajjhānānaṁ bhavantare sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhāra bhedo vutto, so kathaṁ paccetabboti āha ‘‘ekasmiṁ bhavepi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:119_35: Ekasmiṁ bhavesabbappathamaṁ laddhakāle saṅkhāra bhedassa āsannattā vaḷañjanakālepi so eva saṅkhāra bhedo siyāti āsaṅkāsambhavato idaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_36: Tena bhavantare upapatti siddhajjhānānaṁ sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhārabhede vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:119_37: Idāni tāni magga siddhajjhāna upapatti siddhajjhānāni sannihitapaccayaṁ anapekkhitvā maggakkhaṇa upapattikkhaṇesu siddhakāle jhānuppatti paṭipadāya eva sabbaso abhāvaṁ gahetvā aparaṁ vikappaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘jhānuppatti paṭipadā rahitattā vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_38: Evaṁ mahaggatajhānānaṁ aṭṭhakathāvasena siddhaṁ saṅkhāra bhedaṁ vatvā idāni pāḷivasenāpi so siddho yevāti dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_42: Ettha siyā, kasmā idha saṅkhārabhedo na vuttotiādinā vacanakkamena siddho hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_2: Parikammaṁ nāma pathavī, pathavī, āpo, āpo-tiādikaṁ, rūpaṁ aniccaṁ, rūpaṁ dukkhaṁ, rūpaṁ anattā-tiādikañcabhāvanāparikammaṁ adhikāro nāma pubbabhavekatabhāvanākammaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:120_7: Tattha parikamma pubbābhisaṅkhāro pakati pubbābhisaṅkhāro nāma, ayaṁ pakati paccayagaṇo eva.
anya-e0401n0:120_13: Jhānāni ca sabbāni uppannāni nāma natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_18: atthi, imesaṁ sattānaṁ sabbakappesupi kappavināsakāle jhānāni bhāvetvā brahmaloka parāyanatā sabbhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:120_20: Dūrabhave pana samathakammesu akatādhikāro nāma koci natthīti.
anya-e0401n0:120_22: Vipākajjhānesu saṅkhāra bhedassa pubba kammavasena vattabbattā ‘‘kusala kriyajjhānesū’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:120_23: ‘‘Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappo nāma’’ athavā pubbābhisaṅkhāreneva uppajjamānassa nakadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo sambhavatīti asaṅkhārikanti ca, byabhicārābhāvato sasaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti ayaṁ vikappo.
anya-e0401n0:120_24: Tattha asaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_34: Sati pana sambhave ca byabhicāre ca, tathā sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:121_3: Sukhāpana paṭipadā, pacchādandhaṁ vā khippaṁ vā uppannaṁ jhānaṁ sukhappaṭipadaṁ nāma karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:121_5: Antarāyikadhammā nāma ‘kilesantarāyiko ca, kammantarāyiko ca, vipākantarāyiko ca, paññatti vītikkamantarāyiko ca, ariyūpavādantarāyiko ca.
anya-e0401n0:121_9: Bhikkhu bhāveṭhitānaṁ vinaya paññattiṁ vītikkamitvā akatappaṭikammo vītikkamo paññattivītikkamantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_11: Ariyapuggalānaṁ jātiādīhi upavaditvā akkositvā akatappaṭikammaṁ akkosanaṁ ariyūpavādantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_12: Idhapi paṭikamme kate antarāyiko na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:121_14: Ime dhammā imasmiṁ bhave jhānamaggānaṁ antarāyaṁ karontīti antarāyikā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_15: Tehi vimutto antarāyika dhamma vimutto nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_16: ‘‘Kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito’’ti sīlavisuddhi ādikāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṁ paripūraṇa vasena ṭhito.
anya-e0401n0:121_18: ‘‘Pahitatto’’ti, yantaṁ purisathāmena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ, na taṁ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatīti evaṁ pavattena sammappadhāna vīriyena samannāgato.
anya-e0401n0:121_19: So hi pahito pesito anapekkhito attabhāvo anenāti pahitattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:121_22: Pañcapadhāniyaṅgāni nāma saddhāsampannatā, asāṭheyyaṁ, ārogyaṁ, alīnavīriyatā, paññavantatā,ti.
anya-e0401n0:122_6: ‘‘Asadisaṁpī’’ti tihetukukkaṭṭhaṁpi kammaṁ ahetukavipākaṁpi janetītiādinā asadisaṁpi vipākaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_7: ‘‘Bhavaṅgaṭṭhānesu yevā’’ti ettha bhavaṅga saddena paṭisandhiṭṭhāna cutiṭṭhānānipi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n0:122_8: ‘‘Kusalasadisamevā’’ti pathamajjhānakusalaṁ pathamajjhāna vipākameva janeti, dutīyajjhāna kusalaṁ dutīyajjhāna vipākameva janetītiādinā kusala sadisameva vipākaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_10: kriyajjhānaṁ nāma hoti’’ abhedū pacārenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:122_11: Bhedampi abhedaṁ katvā upacāro vohāro abhedū pacāro.
anya-e0401n0:123_3: Atthato pana jhānehi sampayogabhedo jhānabhedoti vutto hotīti āha ‘‘jhānehi sampayogabhedenā’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:123_6: Vibhāvaniyaṁ pana uparisaṅgahagāthāyaṁ jhānaṅga yogabhedena, katvekekantu pañcadhāti vacanaṁ disvā idha jhāna bhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:123_7: Evaṁ santepi idha jhānabhedassa visuṁ adhippetattā ‘‘aññohi jhānabhedo’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:125_6: ‘‘Paricchinnākāso’’ti dvāracchiddavātapānacchiddādiko ākāso, yattha ākāsa kasiṇa nimittaṁ uggaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n0:125_7: Kasiṇa nimittaṁ ugghāṭetvā laddho ākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso, kasiṇaṁ ugghāṭena nibbatto kasiṇugghāṭimoti katvā.
anya-e0401n0:125_9: ‘‘Anantabhāvena pharīyatī’’ti caturaṅgulamattopiso ananta nāmaṁ katvā bhāvanāmanasikārena pharīyati.
anya-e0401n0:125_10: ‘‘Devānaṁ adhiṭṭhānavatthū’’ti mahiddhikānaṁ gāmanagara devānaṁ balippaṭiggahaṇaṭṭhānaṁ vuccati, yattha manussā samaye kula devatānaṁ baliṁ abhiharanti.
anya-e0401n0:125_14: Kusalajjhānaṁ samāpannassavā, vipākajjhānena upapannassavā, kriyajjhānena diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārissavā, tiyojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:125_15: Anantanti vuccati, yathāpathavīkasiṇe pavattanato jhānaṁ pathavīkasiṇanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n0:125_19: ‘‘Anantanti bhāvanāya pavattattā’’ti idaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ anantanti evaṁ pubbabhāga bhāvanāya pavattattā.
anya-e0401n0:125_30: ‘‘Desanāsīsamattaṁ’’ti rājā āgacchatītiādīsu viya padhāna kathāmattanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_32: Kusalabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ puthujjanānañca sekkhānañca kusalabhūtassa dutīyāruppaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_34: Tattha, ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṁ patvā pathamāruppaṁ asamāpajjitvāva dutīyā ruppaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_35: Tassa kusalabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaṁ kriyabhūtassa dutīyā ruppassa ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:125_36: Ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṁ patvā puna tameva pathamā ruppaṁ samāpajjitvā dutīyā ruppaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_38: Tesaṁ dvinnaṁ kriyabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ kriyabhūtasseva dutīyāruppassa ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:127_7: Ekacittakkhaṇiko ariyamaggo, kathaṁ yāva anupādisesa nibbānadhātuyāsavati sandatīti āha ‘‘ānubhāvappharaṇavasenā’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:127_16: ‘‘Na punetī’’ti na puna eti nupagacchati ariyasāvako.
anya-e0401n0:127_19: Evaṁ taṁ anivattagamanaṁ pāḷisādhakehi dīpetvā idāni yuttisādhakehi pakāsetuṁ ‘‘yathā cā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:127_28: So pana maggo pathama maggo, dutīya maggo, tatīya maggo, catuttha maggo,ti catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0401n0:127_29: ‘‘Ādito pajjanaṁ’’ti catūsu maggesu ādimhi pathama maggasotassa pajjanaṁ gamanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:127_33: Sabbe bodhipakkhiya dhammā anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā sototi vuccantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:127_35: Uparisambodhi eva parāyanaṁ yesaṁ te uparisambodhi parāyanā.
anya-e0401n0:127_37: Kathaṁ sotāpatti vacanaṁ maggena samānādhikaraṇaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘pathama magga saṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:127_39: Mārenta gamanoniruttinayena maggoti sijjhatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:128_2: ‘‘Sakiṁ āgacchatī’’ti itogantvā puna idha āgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_12: Imaṁ kāmattabhāvaṁ āgantvā, tasmā āgāmī nāma hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:128_13: ‘‘Ayañca attho’’ti paṭisandhivasena sakiṁ imaṁ lokaṁ āgacchatītiādiko attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_15: Maggasahāyena jhānena vikkhambhitā kilesā maggena samucchinna gatikā honti.
anya-e0401n0:128_23: ‘‘Nānatthā sambhavato’’ti dvīsu itthattasaddesu ekasmiṁ imaṁ kāmāvacara lokanti ekasmiṁ imaṁ manussa lokanti evaṁ nānatthānaṁ asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:128_24: Pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘sabyā bajjho’’ti cetodukkha saṅkhātena cetasikarogā bādhena sahito.
anya-e0401n0:128_28: ‘‘Pacchimassa vākyassā’’ti āgantvā itthattaṁ sotāpanna sakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti vākyassa.
anya-e0401n0:128_29: ‘‘Dvīsu sakadāgāmīsū’’ti āgantvā itthattanti vuttattā tena atthena sakadāgāmināmakesu dvīsu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu.
anya-e0401n0:128_32: Brahmalokeṭhitānaṁ sotāpannānaṁ sattakkhattu parama tādibhāvo natthi viya dutīya phalaṭṭhānaṁ sakadāgāmi bhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0401n0:128_36: ‘‘Heṭṭhū parūpapattivasenā’’ti uparito āgantvā heṭṭhūpapatti ca, heṭṭhato āgantvā uparūpapatti cāti evaṁ heṭṭhūparūpapattivasena.
anya-e0401n0:128_38: ‘‘Pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā’’ti pañcannaṁ puggalānaṁ idha kāmaloke niṭṭhā anupādisesa nibbānapattīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:128_40: Yesaṁ pana aṭṭhakathā cariyānaṁ attho, tesaṁ attheso sakadāgāmi puggalo pañcavidhova vutto, na chaṭṭho puggaloti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:128_41: Yesaṁ pana imaṁ lokanti attho, tesaṁ atthe chaṭṭhopi labbhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘mahāparinibbāna…pe…
anya-e0401n0:128_43: Tattha ‘‘sakiṁ āgamanaṭṭhena āgato yevā’’ti sakiṁ āgamanaṭṭhena sakadāgāmīsu āgatoyeva.
anya-e0401n0:128_44: Sabbaññu buddhāpi pathama phalaṭṭha bhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṁ saṇṭhitā viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:128_47: Sabbaññu buddhāpi dutīya phalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṁ āgamanappakatiyaṁ saṇṭhitāyeva honti.
anya-e0401n0:128_48: Kasmā, tasmiṁ khaṇe taṁ sabhāvānati vattanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:128_51: Etena yaṁ vuttaṁ vibhāvaniyaṁ pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamakova idhādhippetoti.
